item.title: Projects
item.description: VaxMyFam.org With a group of volunteers, I helped create a website to assist non-English speakers in seven US counties in receiving vaccine information and FAQs accurately and efficiently. Featured in: Stanford Daily CryptoUpdater An app to view cryptocurrency data. Published on the Google Play Store. Source code

item.title: Thoughts
item.description: Pithy observations and questions that I’ve been pondering. Some of these may be the start of a blog post :) How do we reduce the bifurication of our economy into high-paid knowledge workers and low-paid service workers? Should we breakup Facebook? How do we reduce political polarization, given the incentives of social media companies and right-wing media?
